1.content: Research Cataclysm-BN codebase structure and architecture
1.details: Analyze the current codebase, identify key systems (rendering, input handling, game logic), understand how ASCII rendering works, and document the current architecture for GUI integration planning.

2.content: Design GUI overlay architecture and dual input system
2.details: Create technical specifications for: 1) GUI layer that doesn't interfere with ASCII rendering, 2) Dual input handling (keyboard + mouse), 3) Event system for GUI-game communication, 4) Performance optimization strategy

3.details: Set up the core GUI system: 1) Initialize GUI framework (SDL2/raylib), 2) Create rendering pipeline for GUI overlay, 3) Implement basic window management, 4) Create event handling system for both mouse and keyboard input

4.content: Create MVP GUI components with game menu system
4.details: Build the essential GUI elements: 1) Visual map overlay (ASCII tiles with color), 2) Inventory panel with clickable items, 3) Character status/health bar, 4) Message log panel, 5) **Game menu system** (main menu, in-game pause menu, save/load interface, settings panel), 6) Basic navigation between GUI elements

5.content: Implement dual input binding and testing
5.details: Connect GUI interactions to existing keyboard commands: 1) Map mouse clicks to keyboard actions, 2) Ensure all features work with keyboard only, 3) Create toggle system for GUI elements, 4) Implement performance testing and optimization

6.details: Document the MVP implementation: 1) How to build and run, 2) User guide for new GUI features, 3) Developer documentation for future enhancements, 4) Performance considerations and limitations
